BackstoryDef.title: industrial drone
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't made as a person, but as drone to work in the vast urbworld factories owned by the corporations. [PAWN_possessive] earliest memories were of drudgery in the mines and workhouses of [PAWN_possessive] industrial world.

BackstoryDef.title: urbworld urchin
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't made as a person, but as drone to work in the vast urbworld factories owned by the corporations. However [PAWN_pronoun] escaped and fled into the darkness of the undercity. [PAWN_nameDef] became an adult in the dark, unwanted reaches of such a place. [PAWN_pronoun] had to fight for every scrap of food.

BackstoryDef.title: test subject
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't made as a person, but as a test subject for medical experiments considered unsavory to perform on Humans. [PAWN_nameDef] was kept alone in a sealed facility from birth and subjected to a variety of behavioural experiments in an attempt to turn [PAWN_objective] into a perfect super-soldier.

BackstoryDef.title: wreckage explorer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't made as a person, but as a slave to the corporations. However the facility they were created in was heavily damaged when war broke out on the planet. [PAWN_possessive] training was never completed. [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked with watching [PAWN_possessive] corporation's livestock among the ruins, but often shirked [PAWN_possessive] duties to go exploring the crashed warships scattered around the planet.

BackstoryDef.title: apocalypse survivor
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't made as a person, but as a slave to the corporations. [PAWN_nameDef] creation occurred during a time of unrest on [PAWN_possessive] homeworld, as climate change threatened mass starvation and flooding. As [PAWN_pronoun] training completed the situation worsened - billions died and peaceful states descended into anarchy. [PAWN_nameDef] was able to escape and did whatever they had to to survive.

BackstoryDef.title: caveworld tender
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't made as a person, but as a slave to the corporations. [PAWN_nameDef] escaped into a cave complex deep beneath the surface of an inhospitable world where [PAWN_pronoun] joined a tribe living there. [PAWN_pronoun] worked with the others tending the tribe's fungus crops.

BackstoryDef.title: caveworld tunneler
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't made as a person, but as a slave to the corporations. [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a digger in the massive underground cave complex.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] knows rock so well that [PAWN_pronoun] can almost navigate caves by smell.

BackstoryDef.title: scout
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't made as a person, but as a slave to the corporations. [PAWN_nameDef] training included military scouting skills.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] learned to survive in the wilderness, to obey, and not to ask questions.

BackstoryDef.title: shelter child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] wasn't made as a person, but as a slave to the corporations. [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a shelter deep beneath a toxic world. [PAWN_pronoun] received a comprehensive education, but had no opportunity to do physical labour.
